attributes.action: stop removing our rights of freedom under the untruth of saving us from ourselves, saving the children or preventing terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more of our freedoms to live as we wish to in society, in our own homes to are being undermined by a paranoid government who appear determined to spy on our every movement, listen or read our every communication and "protect" us from ourselves. We are grown ups and demand to be treated as such.
